article:
The term 'isotonic' may refer to; *Isotonic (exercise physiology) for the term
associated with muscle contraction *An isotone in nuclear physics *Sports drinks
are sometimes designed in an isotonic way to assist athletes in rehydrating
while balancing electrolytes *Isotonicity:
:*Isotonic solutions have equal osmotic pressure:
::*Such as in cell biology when an isotonic environment happens when an equal
::concentration exists inside and outside the cell
